subject: RE: Full colour panels thickness options

full_threads.body:
Hi Lucy, 

Just confirming this has been updated as per your previous email:

https://acoufelt.com/product/colourways/
https://acoufelt.com/au/product/colourways/

Thanks - can we please have this carried across to the global website as well? Leave it for the US for now.

Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy, 

Confirming we have now updated this too: https://acoufelt.com/au/product/colourways/

Looks great!

We've just had some new info come in - could we please update the 30mm spec sheet to the attached and remove 'Black' as an option for the 30mm colourways. 'Natural' should therefore be the only colour that this thickness is available in.

Thanks

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy, 

Confirming the below updates have been made: https://acoufelt.com/au/product/colourways/

Thanks,

Can we please update the NRC range here as well:



And could we also please update the colourway swatches to remove the word 'solid' before each colourway name? (eg. Wasabi WASA). Also you can keep the code name for Lipstick to be just LIPS (rather than Red LIPS)

Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy, 

Sure, confirming these two updates have been made: https://acoufelt.com/au/product/colourways/

Looks good!

Can we please update the NRC RATING in the specification table to be

NRC Rating

0.45 - 0.80

Could we also please update the names of these specification sheets to be 'specification sheet - 12mm, specification sheet - 24mm' etc.



Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy and Karina, 

Confirming we have updated this product on the AU site, please let me know what you think? 
https://acoufelt.com/au/product/colourways/

Updated spec sheet for 30mm attached. Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Looping in @WP Perk Support if they can take a look at the proposed changes? Thanks!

Warm regards,


Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

From: Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt
Sent: Thursday, 30 April 2020 8:47 AM
To: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Cc: Karina Deboar | Acoufelt <karina.deboar@acoufelt.com>
Subject: RE: Full colour panels thickness options


Heath,

New graph for this page below. Thanks!



Warm regards,


Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager


t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310
Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000
acoufelt.com




From: Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt
Sent: Wednesday, 29 April 2020 4:51 PM
To: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Cc: Karina Deboar | Acoufelt <karina.deboar@acoufelt.com>
Subject: RE: Full colour panels thickness options


Hey Heath,


We're happy to go ahead with this layout.


At this stage we're only needing 12, 24 and 30mm listed. The 30mm product is only available in white and black colours, whilst 12 and 24 are available in all of our colourways.

The NRC range for this page should be 0.45-0.80.

Will also need to update the specifications in the table so that this includes:

Thickness

12mm +/- 10% | 0.47" +/- 10%, 24mm +/- 10% | 0.94" +/- 10%, 30mm +/- 10% | 1.2" +/- 10%

Leah is working on incorporating the 12, 24 and 30 into the graph so that it applies to the 3 thicknesses. Will get this across to you shortly so you can update this.

Let me know if you have any q's. Thanks Heath!

Warm regards,


Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager


t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310
Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000
acoufelt.com




From: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Tuesday, 21 April 2020 12:18 PM
To: Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt <lucy.pittman@acoufelt.com>
Cc: Karina Deboar | Acoufelt <karina.deboar@acoufelt.com>
Subject: Re: Full colour panels thickness options


[EXTERNAL]This email came from outside Acoufelt. Don't click links or open files unless you trust the sender.

Hi Lucy,

Thanks for your patience with this.

Given that the other information will vary as well, I think we could add ranges for example the NRC could be 0.45 to 0.xyz, the chart could have all of the values plotted on it and the extra info could be added into the specifications section. With functioning as previously previously sent across.

To have all of the details change when the thickness is selected could be distracting and potentially misleading. It's better to offer this information in parallel to the user so that they can compare and see the differences etc.

I hope that makes sense?

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E.heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M.0415 162 271

On 21 Apr 2020, at 9:22 am, Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt <lucy.pittman@acoufelt.com> wrote:

Hey Heath,


We're looking at adding these new products/thickness options to the website soon - do you think these could still all be loaded onto the full colour panel page or will they require different web pages as per the below?


Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

From: Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt
Sent: Friday, 17 April 2020 3:37 PM
To: Karina Deboar | Acoufelt <karina.deboar@acoufelt.com>; Heath <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: RE: Full colour panels thickness options


Hey Heath,

We have realised that each of the different thicknesses will also require different info in the below circled sections. Could we still tackle this in the option you propose? Could a selection of a thickness under 'available colourways and thickness' also correspond to a set of info in the below whilst keeping the person on the one page, or would we need to create each of these as separate pages?


Hope I make sense - let me know Heath!


<image004.jpg>


Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager


t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310
Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000

Sent: Thursday, 16 April 2020 5:35 PM
To: Karina Deboar | Acoufelt <karina.deboar@acoufelt.com>; Heath <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: RE: Full colour panels thickness options


I think this could work!

My only comment for you K is what can we do with the different spec sheets - will the thickness selection also enable us to switch between the downloads listed? Or would we simply list all of the different spec sheets available for download?

Discuss tomorrow! 😊


Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

[EXTERNAL]This email came from outside Acoufelt. Don't click links or open files unless you trust the sender.

Hi Lucy,

Please have a look at the attached and let me know what you think? The idea is that you would click on the thickness and only the available colours would be shown.

What do you think?

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E.heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M.0415 162 271

<image005.jpg>

<image006.png>

On 14 Apr 2020, at 4:00 pm, Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt <lucy.pittman@acoufelt.com> wrote:

Heath,

We will soon be expanding and offering our 'full colour' panels across a range of thicknesses. At this stage these will only apply to our full colour collection for walls. As you can understand, each of these panel products with different thicknesses require a separate spec sheet and install method, and are also available in a different set of colourways. (see diagram below)

We have previously tossed up breaking these up into separate collections (30mm full colour, 7mm full colour) and having separate product pages for each, and/or having a selection/filter function ('select thickness') for accessing individual pages.

From the website perspective, what do you think is the best layout/navigation for enabling people to explore these different options?


<image003.jpg>

Let me know if you have any questions or whether it would be easier to discuss over a call?


Thanks!


Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager


t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310
Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000
acoufelt.com

<image001.png>
